title: 89: Surviving Trauma with Nurjahan Boulden
itunes:title: 89: Surviving Trauma with Nurjahan Boulden
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: Gun violence and trauma are discussed) The Broads sit down with gun violence survivor Nurjahan Boulden. She tells us her story, the trauma that followed, and her powerful journey of healing through it all. She also discusses living without fear and shares her “6 Agreements for Survivors” and much more. 
NURJAHAN BOULDEN:
Instagram: @nurjahanboulden
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/nurjahanboulden
Link for free Release Anxiety Today Guide: releaseanxietytoday.com (http://releaseanxietytoday.com/)
Link for VIP Belly Dance Package: http://nurjahanboulden.com/vipbellydance
Link for Feel Safe Again™ gun violence survivor FB group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/feelsafeagain/
She also offers an online Feel Safe Again™ 6-Week Program, which launches twice a year. The next one will take place in January 2020, and you can find out more info about it at feelsafeagainprogram.com (http://feelsafeagainprogram.com/)
